overview: Shot all around Dallas, Texas, The Cinematic Approach features skits and rocket skateboard stunts from 8 of Dallas' cool skatin' dudes: Ryan Stalsby, Matt Orwig, Set Lopez, Jerid Dragna, Paul Feigenschue, Wes Wakeland, Jerry Esquivel, and Brian Rahn. Directed, filmed, and edited by Chase Whale.
tagline: Skits and rocket skateboard stunts from 8 of Dallas' cool skatin' dudes.
title: The Cinematic Approach
